user_query: I'm planning a surprise party for my sister's graduation and I want to create a playlist with her favorite tracks. Can you suggest some tracks from Soundcloud that have been liked by users? Additionally, I would like to download one of the tracks and get its information, including the duration and the number of plays it has received.

TaskList.description: Query popular tracks on Soundcloud based on user likes.
Select a track from the queried list to download and retrieve additional information.
Download the selected track from Soundcloud.
Gather metadata information of the selected track, including duration and number of plays.
